trans-unit.source: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="a063fce2-da3d-492a-8fae-6c92d22f7866" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Activity</link> for the latest JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="a063fce2-da3d-492a-8fae-6c92d22f7866" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Copy Activity</link> for the latest JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: The Copy Activity copies the data from a data store to another data store.
trans-unit.target: The Copy Activity copies the data from a data store to another data store.

trans-unit.source: The store can be either a cloud or on-premises store.
trans-unit.target: The store can be either a cloud or on-premises store.

trans-unit.source: It consumes one input and produces one output.
trans-unit.target: It consumes one input and produces one output.

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> of the activity should set to <embeddedLabel>CopyActivity</embeddedLabel> in the pipeline JSON definition.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> of the activity should set to <embeddedLabel>CopyActivity</embeddedLabel> in the pipeline JSON definition.

trans-unit.source: Read through <link xlink:href="0ccbc223-a448-441d-8b2e-90bd937c777e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Pipelines</link> for overall pipeline definition and activity definition within first before reading this topic.
trans-unit.target: Read through <link xlink:href="0ccbc223-a448-441d-8b2e-90bd937c777e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Pipelines</link> for overall pipeline definition and activity definition within first before reading this topic.

trans-unit.source: This topic provides details about elements used in the <embeddedLabel>transformation</embeddedLabel> section of the activity definition.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides details about elements used in the <embeddedLabel>transformation</embeddedLabel> section of the activity definition.

trans-unit.source: For the <embeddedLabel>Copy</embeddedLabel> activity, the <embeddedLabel>transformation</embeddedLabel> section in the JSON definition contains <embeddedLabel>source</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>sink</embeddedLabel> sections.
trans-unit.target: For the <embeddedLabel>Copy</embeddedLabel> activity, the <embeddedLabel>transformation</embeddedLabel> section in the JSON definition contains <embeddedLabel>source</embeddedLabel> and <embeddedLabel>sink</embeddedLabel> sections.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, source type is set to <embeddedLabel>SqlSource</embeddedLabel> and sink type is set to <embeddedLabel>BlobSink</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In the following example, source type is set to <embeddedLabel>SqlSource</embeddedLabel> and sink type is set to <embeddedLabel>BlobSink</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: See the following topics for more information:
trans-unit.target: See the following topics for more information:

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="34d563cf-1163-47e5-96b8-9c7aec5f37d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Supported Sources and Sinks</link> topic for all sources and sinks supported by the Copy Activity and properties of those sources sinks.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="34d563cf-1163-47e5-96b8-9c7aec5f37d2" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Supported Sources and Sinks</link> topic for all sources and sinks supported by the Copy Activity and properties of those sources sinks.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="f1ae4f5b-8555-4472-9136-7b65625941bf" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Examples (Copy Activity)</link> topic for examples of using the Copy Activity.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="f1ae4f5b-8555-4472-9136-7b65625941bf" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Examples (Copy Activity)</link> topic for examples of using the Copy Activity.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Copy data with Data Factory</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=517553</linkUri></externalLink> for conceptual information as well as well as links to walkthroughs.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Copy data with Data Factory</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=517553</linkUri></externalLink> for conceptual information as well as well as links to walkthroughs.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Get started with Azure Data Factory</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=516910</linkUri></externalLink> for an end-to-end tutorial that provides step-by-step instructions to create a data factory with a pipeline that copies data from a Azure Blob storage to an Azure SQL database.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Get started with Azure Data Factory</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=516910</linkUri></externalLink> for an end-to-end tutorial that provides step-by-step instructions to create a data factory with a pipeline that copies data from a Azure Blob storage to an Azure SQL database.

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>Enable pipelines to work with on-premises data</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=516966</linkUri></externalLink> for a walkthrough that provides step-by-step instructions to create a data factory to copy data from an on-premises SQL Server database to an Azure blob.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>Enable pipelines to work with on-premises data</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=516966</linkUri></externalLink> for a walkthrough that provides step-by-step instructions to create a data factory to copy data from an on-premises SQL Server database to an Azure blob.
